Product Development+Engineering+Material.EXPLANATION: Measures the accuracy of material selection compared to the specified requirements.
Product Development+Engineering+Material.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Material Selections / Total Material Selections) * 100

Product Development+Engineering+Material.KPIS: Time to Market for Material Designs
Product Development+Engineering+Material.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time from initial material design concept to market launch.
Product Development+Engineering+Material.FORMULA: Total Time from Material Design Completion to Market Launch

Product Development+Engineering+Material.EXPLANATION: Evaluates the performance of materials based on criteria such as durability, cost-effectiveness, and suitability.
Measures how well actual costs for material development adhere to the budgeted costs.
Product Development+Engineering+Material.FORMULA: (Actual Material Development Cost / Budgeted Material Development Cost) * 100

Product Development+Engineering+Material.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of material tests that meet all specified requirements.
Product Development+Engineering+Material.FORMULA: (Number of Successful Material Tests / Total Material Tests) * 100

Product Development+Engineering+Material.EXPLANATION: Measures the degree of innovation in material development, considering new materials and applications.
Product Development+Engineering+Material.FORMULA: (Number of New Material Innovations / Total Material Designs) * 100

Product Development+Engineering+Material.EXPLANATION: Assesses how efficiently materials are used in the production process.
Measures the average satisfaction score of customers with the materials used.
Product Development+Engineering+Material.FORMULA: (Sum of Customer Satisfaction Ratings for Materials / Number of Customers)
